= Introduction =

  * Download and serialize EOD market data from yahoo into a Apache Derby embedded db.
  * Technology
   * *Core Java* 
   * *Maven* 
   * *Apache Derby*


= Details =

Details on the Yahoo "api" [http://www.gummy-stuff.org/Yahoo-data.htm here].

== Short term project : ==

Extract EOD market data from the yahoo "api".
Serialize into an embedded apache derby database.
Visualize the information ( Graph ).

== Long Term : ==

The goals is to extract realtime market data information from the yahoo website and serialized them. The future development should provide graphical interface for stock price visualization.

== Alternative : == 

=== EODDAta ===

From EODData it is possible to purchase historical market data for a fees.
So the goal would  use the http://eoddata.com/ market data. Intraday as well as EOD.

=== Netbean RCP platform ===

Integrate the application within the [https://netbeans.org/features/platform/ Netbeans RCP] platform.
